document.full_text: two inmates were killed and 14 people were wounded in a prison riot sunday in tikrit, the home city of former iraqi leader saddam hussein, a police source said.
document.title: two die, 14 wounded in iraq prison riot: police
lines_and_colors: two inmates were killed and 14 people were wounded in a prison riot sunday in tikrit, the home city of former iraqi leader saddam hussein, a police source said.
